title: I Spent Hours Searching for the Best On-Sale Giftsâ€”These 16 Came Out on Top
excerpt: Our editors scrolled so you don't have to. Read this story to see her favorite beauty and lifestyle gifts from CVS.
text: I may or may not have spent the last few days glued to my computer in search of the best gifts. Even when shopping wasn't part of my job description, I'd spend hours on end sourcing the most incredible deals and products ahead of the holiday season. These days the scrollbar is miniscule and I have too many open browser tabs to count, which means that my scouting was worth it. I found myself on the CVS website (AKA my go-to for affordable finds), adding my favorite lip combos, moisturizers, candles, and even high-quality home decor items to my cart. As much as I want to keep all of these products to myself, I'm taking advantage of all of the amazing early deals that CVS has ahead of Black Friday and buying gifts for the family now. If you want to treat your loved ones (or yourself) to some incredible discounted items from your favorite brands, just keep scrolling. Maybelline Lifter Lip Gift Set Marc Jacobs Daisy Eau de Toilette Spray L.A. Colors Dream to Gleam Countdown to Beauty Gift Set Star Candle Co. Textured Jar Candle in Winter Woods Maud Borup Cherry Mega Gummy Bear Lindt Gourmet Chocolate Candy Truffles Gift Box e.l.f Flawless Face 6 Piece Brush Collection Aurora World Marius Nutcracker Stuffed Bear Merry Brite Nutcracker Soldier Star Candle Co. Bubble Jar Candle in Cozy Flannel Vichy Aqualia Thermal Rich Cream Face Moisturizer Olly Women's Multivitamin Ferrero Rocher Gold Ribbon Gift Cube Wayland Square Quilted Slipper Boots Wayland Square Swirl Throw Blanket Aniyah Morinia is an NYC-based associate beauty and fashion editor at Who What Wear. She has worked in fashion media since 2018 and joined WWW's branded content team, where she not only writes for some of her favorite brands but also creates content for them. Aniyah will find any excuse to get a photo of her outfit and absolutely loves taking photos. She graduated from the University of Florida in 2020 with a bachlor's degree in public relations and started post-grad life freelancing for EveryStylishGirl, Riot Swim, and Baby Tress. Since starting at Who What Wear, Aniyah has developed a passion for hosting livestreams, working red carpets, and creating TikToks in addition to writing fashion and beauty stories. When Aniyah's not writing or creating content, you can find her exploring Brooklyn and eating her way through the city. She'll never pass up the opportunity to uncover an NYC hidden gem or mix and mingle with her friends (all while swapping holy-grail products, of course).
html:
I may or may not have spent the last few days glued to my computer in search of the best gifts. Even when shopping wasn't part of my job description, I'd spend hours on end sourcing the most incredible deals and products ahead of the holiday season. These days the scrollbar is miniscule and I have too many open browser tabs to count, which means that my scouting was worth it. I found myself on the CVS website (AKA my go-to for affordable finds), adding my favorite lip combos, moisturizers, candles, and even high-quality home decor items to my cart. As much as I want to keep all of these products to myself, I'm taking advantage of all of the amazing early deals that CVS has ahead of Black Friday and buying gifts for the family now. If you want to treat your loved ones (or yourself) to some incredible discounted items from your favorite brands, just keep scrolling.

Aniyah Morinia is an NYC-based associate beauty and fashion editor at Who What Wear. She has worked in fashion media since 2018 and joined WWW's branded content team, where she not only writes for some of her favorite brands but also creates content for them. Aniyah will find any excuse to get a photo of her outfit and absolutely loves taking photos. She graduated from the University of Florida in 2020 with a bachlor's degree in public relations and started post-grad life freelancing for EveryStylishGirl, Riot Swim, and Baby Tress. Since starting at Who What Wear, Aniyah has developed a passion for hosting livestreams, working red carpets, and creating TikToks in addition to writing fashion and beauty stories. When Aniyah's not writing or creating content, you can find her exploring Brooklyn and eating her way through the city. She'll never pass up the opportunity to uncover an NYC hidden gem or mix and mingle with her friends (all while swapping holy-grail products, of course).
